duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to improve top line sales growth within The Home Depot stores in the San Diego, CA territory.
Build and maintain relationships with DIY'ers, professional contractors, property services, institutional, trade accounts, and other end-users to meet sales expectations.
Analyze territory sales performance reports and work with other sales professionals to develop strategic plans to increase growth.

education_certification.credential: High School graduate with at least one year of sales or retail experience.
